text: The 1985 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Bassano del Grappa, Italy in 1985.World Championship Track Cycling 2014-1893 Fourteen events were contested, 12 for men (5 for professionals, 7 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Professional Events |- |Men's keirin |Urs Freuler || Ottavio Dazzan || Masamitsu Takizawa Dieter Giebken |- |Men's sprint |Kōichi Nakano || Yoshiyuki Matsueda || Ottavio Dazzan |- | |Hans-Henrik Ørsted || Tony Doyle || Gregor Braun |- |Men's points race | Urs Freuler || Hans Ledermann || Stefano Allocchio |- |Men's motor-paced |Bruno Vicino || Danny Clark || Werner Betz |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Men's Amateur Events |- | |Jens Glücklich || Philippe Boyer || Martin Vinnicombe |- |Men's sprint |Lutz Hesslich || Michael Hübner || Ralf-Guido Kuschy |- | |Viatcheslav Ekimov || Gintautas Umaras || Roland Günther |- |Men's team pursuit | Roberto Amadio Massimo Brunelli Gianpaolo Grisondi Silvio Martinello || Ryszard Dawidowicz Marian Turowski Leszek Stępniewski Andrzej Sikorski || Viatcheslav Ekimov Alexander Krasnov Marat Ganeiev Vassili Schpundov |- |Men's points race |Martin Penc || Philippe Grivel || Dan Frost |- |Men's motor-paced |Roberto Dotti || Roland Königshofer || Mario Gentili |- |Men's tandem | Vítězslav Vobořil Roman Řehounek || Nelson Vails Leslie Barczewski || Sascha Allscheid Franck Weber |- bgcolor="#cccccc" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint |Isabelle Nicoloso |Connie Paraskevin |Natalia Krushelnitskaia |- |Women's individual pursuit |Rebecca Twigg |Jeannie Longo |Margaret Maas |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1985 UCI Road World Championships ==References== Uci Track Cycling World Championships, 1985 Track cycling Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:International cycle races hosted by Italy
title: 1985 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
